error.message: Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\Core\Field\AllowedTagsXssTrait in class Drupal\related_block_condition\Plugin\Field\FieldFormatter\RelatedBlockConditionFormatter. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Field\FieldFilteredMarkup instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to related_block_condition.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
